body.name: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Long-Sleeve Water-Resistant Packable Puffer Jacket (Available in Plus Size)
features: Fabric type Shell: 100% Nylon; Lining: 100% Polyester; Fill: 100% Polyester
REGULAR FIT: Close but comfortable fit through chest, waist, and hips.

WATER-RESISTANT TAFFETA: Plain weave shell fabric in 100% Nylon for solid colors and 100% Polyester for prints and neon colors. Fully lined, quilted and insulated. Designed to keep you extra protected for the coldest winter days

WATER RESISTANT PACKABLE PUFFER: This ultralight packable puffer is the perfect essential for bringing comfort and warmth to your everyday. Wear it with a t-shirt for brisk fall days or layer with a sweater for the colder winter months. It's easy packability makes it the perfect on the go jacket.

DETAILS: Features a classic quilted pattern, flattering seam details for the perfect fit, front zipper, zip pockets, stand collar, long sleeves with elasticized cuffs, and packs neatly into included carrying bag.
body.description: We listen to customer feedback and fine-tune every detail to ensure our clothes are more comfortable, higher quality, and longer lasting—at affordable prices for the whole family. Amazon Essentials is focused on creating affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing you can rely on. Our line of women's apparel includes cashmere sweaters, fleece and down jackets, and more, including plus-size options. Our consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain the highest standards in quality and comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Winter Essential: Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Long-Sleeve Puffer Jacket Review
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Long-Sleeve Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket has quickly become my go-to winter companion. If you're searching for an affordable yet high-quality puffer jacket that offers warmth, style, and protection from the elements, look no further.Pros:Impressive Warmth: Despite its lightweight design, this puffer jacket offers remarkable warmth. The synthetic insulation effectively traps heat, keeping you cozy in cold temperatures without the bulk.Water-Resistant: The water-resistant outer shell provides protection against light rain and snow. It's an excellent choice for wet and chilly days when you need to stay dry.Flattering Fit: The jacket features a tailored fit that flatters the body's contours without feeling restrictive. It maintains a feminine silhouette while offering room for layering.Comfortable Design: The long sleeves and high collar provide additional warmth and comfort. The jacket zips up easily, and the zipper functions smoothly.Packs Well: This jacket is lightweight and compressible, making it easy to pack for travel. It doesn't take up much space in your luggage.Variety of Colors: Amazon Essentials offers a variety of colors, allowing you to choose a shade that suits your style and matches your winter wardrobe.Affordable Price: The jacket offers excellent value for its quality and features. It provides the warmth and protection of higher-priced alternatives without breaking the bank.Cons:Limited Thickness: While it offers adequate warmth for most winter conditions, it may not be sufficient for extremely cold climates without additional layering.No Hood: This jacket does not have a hood, which might be a drawback for those looking for extra head protection in rainy or snowy weather. However, you can pair it with a separate hooded layer.In summary, the Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Long-Sleeve Water-Resistant Puffer Jacket is a budget-friendly gem that excels in providing warmth, comfort, and style. Whether you're heading out for a casual winter stroll or need a versatile jacket for everyday wear, it delivers on all fronts. Its water-resistant feature is a bonus for unpredictable weather, and the variety of available colors ensures you can find the perfect match for your wardrobe. While it may not be the thickest jacket for extreme cold, it offers fantastic value for its price point and is an excellent choice for milder winter climates. I highly recommend it as a reliable and stylish winter essential.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this coat!
reviews.reviewText: This coat is so much warmer than I expected! It fits true to size and is very well made. It is easy to clean and packs down small (in the stuff sack that was included with it.) A great coat for a great value!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size, true to pictured color.
reviews.reviewText: Pretty jacket, good color match and fits nicely. No issues with stiching or the sipper. Very lightweight. It's just not as warm as I expected. I haven't owned this type of jacket before but I was assuming it would be a little warmer. It is perfect for moderatly cold days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect lightweight jacket
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the pink one for my daughter and she loves it. It is so cute, lightweight, and great quality. Ordered a size up and it fits perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect travel jacket
reviews.reviewText: After freezing on one trip where the weather was supposed to be warm, I always pack a light down jacket. Always. My go-to travel down is now too ratty, so this was a replacement and it worked out fine. Note, this jacket has polyester fill rather than down, but it's still light, warm and squeezable.With a sweater and scarf, it keeps me toasty into the high forties. Left open over a dress or t-shirt, it acts like a light sweater.One excellent feature is the two long interior pockets. They're deep enough that stuff doesn't fall out, perfect for passport, wallet, phone or boarding passes. Because they're deep and inside, the pockets are pretty (completely?) pickpocket-proof, yet easily accessible.I did not find the fit boxy as some have. It's fairly flattering, and I love the dark green color I got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute & decent price
reviews.reviewText: Hi!So I looked at reviews prior to buying a LOT of ppl said it runs 2 sizes too smallI am typically a M in women (when there is stretch) then I saw another review saying the woman was my exact height and weight (totally forgot weight is distributed differently ) so I went up 3SIZES !Honestly I could’ve went with a L OR XLI GOT A XXL IT FITS GOOD(A bit big , but nothing too noticeable) arm length is perfect & it comes a little bit under the top of my bottom close to the middle but not quite .I am 5’7-5’8195lbs-200lbs34B44 hipsSo tall and thicker at the bottom small on top .. updateOrdered a L & it fit PERFECT LITERALLY WITH ROOM FOR A LIGHTWEIGHT SWEATER UNDER . & it is warm .So def size up by ONE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As someone who's always on the lookout for practical yet stylish outdoor gear, stumbling upon the Amazon Essentials Women's Lightweight Puffer Jacket felt like hitting the jackpot. With its promise of being water-resistant and packable, it seemed tailor-made for my spontaneous adventures and the unpredictable weather in my city.The true gem of this jacket, is its packability. It folds down into its own pocket, transforming into a compact pouch that fits in my tote or backpack with ease. This feature has made it my go-to choice for travel and day trips, knowing I can stow it away without it taking up precious space.Despite its lightweight design, this jacket provides a surprising amount of warmth. It's been my faithful companion during chilly mornings and evenings, offering just the right level of insulation without the bulkiness of traditional puffer jackets. The long sleeves and zippered pockets are thoughtful touches, adding to its functionality and warmth.

La elegí por color, la talla me quedo bien, el color es tal como se muestra. Me parecía muy delgada, pero la realidad es que calienta bastante bien, sin ser estorbosa, es bastante cómoda. Lo que sí, no logré que entrará en la bolsita.

I purchased this jacket for travel. It was ideal. The jacket packs into its small pouch. The jacket is lightweight and is suitable for cool weather. In cold weather it is quite warm with a sweater underneath.I love the bone colour. The fit is true to size.
MI piace molto la consistenza, la leggerezza e la vestibilitàMolto versatile da usare sotto altre giacche o da solo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that the colour matched the picture I was worried about it being different as it happens most of the times. Light weight but very warm. Very good price. Came on time. Thanks
